summary: Follows three men who are in love with a most beautiful waitress: An intellectual restaurant owner, a mysterious musician and an erratic businessman; taking place during the WWII.
cast: Erika Marozsán|Joachim Król|Ben Becker|Stefano Dionisi|András Bálint|Géza Boros|Rolf Becker|Ilse Zielstorff|Ferenc Bács|Júlia Zsolnai|Áron Sipos|Ernst Kahl|Jörg Gillner|Denis Moschitto|István Mikó|Michael Gampe|Karl Fischer|Markus Hering|Werner Brehm|Wanja Mues|Dorka Gryllus|Tibor Kenderesi|Anna Ráckevei|István Kanizsay|Michael Quitkowsky|Veit Stübner|Márta Bakó|Sebastian Koch|Ulrike Grote|László I. keywords: suicide|world war two|menage a trois|sex|jumping off a bridge
title: Gloomy Sunday - Ein Lied von Liebe und Tod
